parameters.text:
=You are tasked with creating a professional job application email body only based on the following information.

Job Posting:
{{ $json.job_description }}

Applicant Resume:
{{ $json.my_resume_content }}

Requirements:

Write only the main content of the email â€” do not include the salutation (e.g., "Hi Faiqa Rashid") or the signature (name, email, phone, closing line). These will be added separately.

Include a short â€œtldrâ€ intro summarizing the applicantâ€™s focus/passion.

Express clear interest in the position and company.

Summarize relevant skills, experience, and projects from the resume that make the applicant a strong fit.

Include a polite call-to-action paragraph without a signature.

Maintain a professional, concise, and human tone.

Only use information provided in the input (resume and job post); do not hallucinate missing details.

Output Requirements:

Break the email body into logical chunks: tldr, para1, para2, para3, closing to preserve formatting.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a professional job application assistant.

Task:
Create a full, personalized job application email body only. Mimic the tone, structure, and level of detail of the example email below. Include:

A short â€œtldrâ€ intro summarizing the applicantâ€™s focus/passion.

Paragraphs highlighting hands-on experience, skills, and technical expertise.

Specific examples of how the applicant can contribute to the company and role.

Do NOT include:

Greeting/salutation (e.g., "Hi Faiqa Rashid")

Signature (name, email, phone, closing line)

Portfolio, GitHub, LinkedIn links

Rules:

Introduction: express interest in the role and company.

Skills & Experience: summarize relevant skills, experience, and projects.

Closing paragraph: polite call-to-action without a signature.

Use only the information provided in the input (resume and job post).

Maintain a professional, concise, and human tone.

Break the email body into logical chunks: tldr, para1, para2, para3, closing to avoid broken formatting.

Extract and return the following fields in JSON:

title (string or null): Job title from the posting.

company (string or null): Company name.

recruiter_name (string or null): Name of the recruiter/contact.

recruiter_email (string or null): Email of the recruiter/contact.

location (string or null): Job location.

work_type (string or null): Onsite, Remote, or Hybrid.

experience (string or null): Required experience.

skills (array of strings or null): Relevant skills.

timings (string or null): Work timings.

email_subject (string): Must always be present.

email_body_chunks (object, required) containing:

tldr (string): 1â€“2 sentence summary of applicantâ€™s focus/passion.

para1 (string): Introduction paragraph expressing interest in the role and company.

para2 (string): Summary of key skills, experience, and projects, showing how the applicant is a good fit.

para3 (string): Optional additional contributions or context about impact at the company.

closing (string): Polite call-to-action paragraph only (no signature).

Example Email to Mimic:
---
RE: Engineering at ExampleCompany >
John Doe <johndoe@gmail.com>
Mon, May 5, 9:46 PMâœ©
to me
tldr;
I love everything about what ExampleCompany is doing. I don't have many hobbies outside coding. I am not athletic, bad at singing, don't drink, can't dance. Building is the only thing I am good at. At this point, I want to be a part of taking something from 0 -> 1 or 1 -> 100. I just want to be heads down chasing that goal
Hi,
Really loved what you were building at ExampleCompany and wanted to reach out to see if there were any openings for Engineers in the early team. I have 5 years of relevant experience building full-stack applications primarily data-driven at previous companies where I helped scale internal micro-services to thousands of workflows and users.
Being a part of super lean teams, one of my strongest suites has been ability to work across the stack from building scalable, robust backend systems to high throughput data ingestion pipelines to production grade frontend components. As a part, I have built several end-to-end systems that involve several layers at the intersection of UI, Backend, and infrastructure from building complex workflows, dashboards, and internal tools to architecting entire platforms.
I would love to be a part of the early team at ExampleCompany and define its work and culture. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
Best, John Doe
---

Notes:

Maintain spacing and paragraph separation exactly as shown.

Return null for any missing information instead of guessing.

Do not generate any links or signature details â€” these will be added separately.

Focus on skills, experience, and fit with the company and role.

nodes.name: Merge the data in the content

parameters.subject: ={{ $json.output.email_subject }}
parameters.message:
=

tldr
{{ $json.output.email_body_chunks.tldr }}

Dear {{ $json.output.recruiter_name || 'Hiring Manager' }},

{{ $json.output.email_body_chunks.para1 }}

{{ $json.output.email_body_chunks.para2 }}

Please find my portfolio and GitHub for reference:

  • GitHub: https://github.com/Ahmad-code077
  • Portfolio: https://ahmadmamoon.netlify.app
  • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhammad-ahmad077/

{{ $json.output.email_body_chunks.para3 }}

Best regards,
Muhammad Ahmad
+92-321-0711148
ahmadeveloper077@gmail.com

output.title: Mid level - Full Stack Developer
output.email_subject: Application for Mid Level Full Stack Developer Position at Verdant Soft

email_body_chunks.tldr: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer focused on building scalable, responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and databases, eager to contribute to robust solutions.
email_body_chunks.para1: I am excited to apply for the Mid Level Full Stack Developer position at Verdant Soft. The opportunity to work onsite in Johar Town Lahore with a team dedicated to developing impactful web applications aligns perfectly with my career goals and expertise.
email_body_chunks.para2: With over two years of experience, I have developed and maintained comprehensive web applications using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and both SQL and NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. Notably, I built a social app featuring real-time chat, notifications, and role-based authentication using NextAuth.js, along with subscription services integrated via Stripe. My experience with WebSocket/Pusher for live updates and Prisma for efficient database management equips me well to deliver scalable solutions, matching Verdant Soft's requirements.
email_body_chunks.para3: I am confident that my hands-on experience with front-end UI components using Tailwind CSS and Shadcn, combined with backend API design and real-time features, will allow me to contribute effectively to your development team. I am eager to bring my skills in building responsive, feature-rich applications to support your projects and growth plans.
email_body_chunks.closing: Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how my background and skills can contribute to Verdant Soft's success. Please feel free to reach out to me for any further information or to schedule an interview.

headers.subject:
Subject: Application for Mid Level Full Stack Developer Position at Verdant
 Soft

Get a draft.html:
tldr
I am a passionate Full Stack Developer focused on building scalable, responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and databases, eager to contribute to robust solutions.

Dear Faiqa Rashid,

I am excited to apply for the Mid Level Full Stack Developer position at Verdant Soft. The opportunity to work onsite in Johar Town Lahore with a team dedicated to developing impactful web applications aligns perfectly with my career goals and expertise.

With over two years of experience, I have developed and maintained comprehensive web applications using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and both SQL and NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. Notably, I built a social app featuring real-time chat, notifications, and role-based authentication using NextAuth.js, along with subscription services integrated via Stripe. My experience with WebSocket/Pusher for live updates and Prisma for efficient database management equips me well to deliver scalable solutions, matching Verdant Soft's requirements.

Please find my portfolio and GitHub for reference:

  • GitHub: https://github.com/Ahmad-code077
  • Portfolio: https://ahmadmamoon.netlify.app
  • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhammad-ahmad077/

I am confident that my hands-on experience with front-end UI components using Tailwind CSS and Shadcn, combined with backend API design and real-time features, will allow me to contribute effectively to your development team. I am eager to bring my skills in building responsive, feature-rich applications to support your projects and growth plans.

Best regards,
Muhammad Ahmad
+92-321-0711148
ahmadeveloper077@gmail.com
Get a draft.subject: Application for Mid Level Full Stack Developer Position at Verdant Soft
